item.title: Mounting SMB shares over Meterpreter
item.description: Ok, this is pretty straight forward no magic: Got a shell, doesn’t have to be SYSTEM Add a route to the internal range or directly to the host you want over the session you want Mosy on over to the Socks4a module. And in another terminal we need to make sure our proxychains.conf file in /etc/ or where ever you store your conf is correct.Â It defaults to 9050 on 127.
